categories: Category:Sith in the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: Tsiat was a male Keshiri Sith Master of the Lost Tribe of Sith present at the New Jedi Temple during the last battle between Abeloth and the Jedi; he was ordered to keep watch to their prisoner Wynn Dorvan, but Wynn managed to liberate himself and took Tsiat's blaster.
